thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel, good service and great location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel, good service and great location - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: WestEndAllan
title: Nice hotel, good service and great location
text:
We had an excellent 3 night stay in the Villa Beaumarchais with my father in law and his girlfriend.
The hotel is in an excellent location, within walking distance of loads of bars and restaurants.
Notre dame is about 20 minutes walk from the hotel.
The rooms were clean, although small.
The service in the bar was very good also.
Will definitely stay here on our next visit to Paris
